price: Kuma kada dũkiyõyinsu da ɗiyansu su bã ka sha'awa. Abin sani kawai, Allah Yanã nufin Ya yi musu azãba da su a cikin dũniya, kuma rãyukansu su fita alhãli kuwa sunã kãfirai.
arabic: وَلَا تُعۡجِبۡكَ أَمۡوَٰلُهُمۡ وَأَوۡلَٰدُهُمۡۚ إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُعَذِّبَهُم بِهَا فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَتَزۡهَقَ أَنفُسُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā tuʿ'jib'ka amwāluhum wa-awlāduhum innamā yurīdu al-lahu an yuʿadhibahum bihā fī al-dun'yā watazhaqa anfusuhum wahum kāfirūna
